name: ski
example_en: We decided to ski down the mountain despite the heavy snow.
example_cn: 尽管下着大雪，我们还是决定滑雪下山。
word_family: skier (n. 滑雪者), skiing (n. 滑雪运动), skiable (adj. 可滑雪的)
memory_tips: 词源：来自古挪威语 'skíð'，意为“木条”或“滑雪板”。联想记忆：想象滑雪时脚下的滑雪板在雪地上滑行的声音和感觉。图像记忆：想象一个滑雪者在雪山斜坡上快速滑下的场景。

image_prompt.main_image: A skier in colorful ski gear, gliding down a snowy mountain slope with ski poles in hand, surrounded by snow-covered trees and a clear blue sky.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of friends laughing and skiing together on a sunny day, with snow flying from their skis and a cozy ski lodge visible in the background.

collocations: ski resort (滑雪胜地); ski slope (滑雪坡); ski equipment (滑雪装备)
